column2: "No, no, I wasn't hinting that you should go! I'd be totally cool with it if you did, though."
"But this time, the mission's crazy dangerous because they're fast AND powerful. I bet even you'd have a tough time of it."
"...well, recently I've come to understand that no matter what I say, you're going to make it happen."
"All I can really do is cheer you on from here, so go give 'em hell. I can't wait to hear your report!"
